turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about 1978 French Open – Men's Singles.
turn.1: What happened at the 1978 French Open?
turn.2: 1978 French Open – Men's Singles  First-seeded Björn Borg defeated defending champion Guillermo Vilas 6–1, 6–1, 6–3 in the final to win the Men's Singles tennis title at the 1978 French Open.
turn.3: What else did you find interesting?
turn.4: Borg did not lose a single set in the event, and only 32 games in total, which remains a record in the history of the tournament.
turn.6: The tournament also featured the first Grand Slam tournament appearance of Ivan Lendl.
